00007 #include "mexopencv.hpp"
00008 using namespace std;
00009 using namespace cv;
00010 
00018 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00019                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00020 {
00021     // Check the number of arguments
00022     if (nrhs<1 || ((nrhs%2)!=1) || nlhs>2)
00023         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00024 
00025     // Argument vector
00026     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00027 
00028     // return the descriptor size
00029     if (nrhs==1 && rhs[0].isChar() && rhs[0].toString()=="DescriptorSize") {
00030         plhs[0] = MxArray(ORB().descriptorSize());
00031         return;
00032     }
00033 
00034     // Option processing
00035     int n_features = 500;
00036     float scale_factor = 1.2f;
00037     int edge_threshold = 31;
00038     int n_levels = 8;
00039     int first_level = 0;
00040     int WTA_K = 2;
00041     int score_type = ORB::HARRIS_SCORE;
00042     int patch_size = 31;
00043     Mat mask;
00044     for (int i=1; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00045         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00046         if (key=="NFeatures")
00047             n_features = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00048         else if (key=="ScaleFactor")
00049             scale_factor = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00050         else if (key=="NLevels")
00051             n_levels = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00052         else if (key=="EdgeThreshold")
00053             edge_threshold = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00054         else if (key=="FirstLevel")
00055             first_level = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00056         else if (key=="Mask")
00057             mask = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_8U);
00058         else if (key=="WTA_K")
00059             WTA_K = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00060         else if (key=="ScoreType")
00061             score_type = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00062         else if (key=="PatchSize")
00063             patch_size = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00064         else
00065             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00066     }
00067 
00068     // Process
00069     ORB orb(n_features,scale_factor,n_levels,edge_threshold,
00070             first_level,WTA_K,score_type,patch_size);
00071     Mat image(rhs[0].toMat());
00072     vector<KeyPoint> keypoints;
00073     bool useProvidedKeypoints=false;
00074     if (nlhs>1) {
00075         Mat descriptors;
00076         orb(image, mask, keypoints, descriptors, useProvidedKeypoints);
00077         plhs[1] = MxArray(descriptors);
00078     }
00079     else
00080         orb(image, mask, keypoints);
00081     plhs[0] = MxArray(keypoints);
00082 }
